Articles.Content: If an observatory is going to be implemented, what would you guys say to it giving launch windows to discovered planets? Personally I'd never be able to get to another planet through trial and error, so an in game function for finding ideal launch windows wouldn't go amiss.

That's not a bad idea. Maybe after some research into the idea and finding a nearby planet it could show the launch window for that planet.

Do you think it should show phase angles as well?

I would assume that this is a critical part of "Flight Planning", which appears on the "Already Suggested" list, and (by implication) as part of "Mission control room: Create flight plans and take on missions and challenges" which is one of the Planned Features.

Since everything in this suggestion has already been suggested or is planned, it is best if this thread is prevented from growing any further.
